title: How to Get a Group Link on Telegram on iPhone or iPad

steps.title: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad. It’s the blue icon with a white paper airplane inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . It’s at the bottom-center part of the screen.

steps.title: Tap a private group.
steps.content: Tap a private group. The contents of the group will appear.

steps.title: Tap the group’s image.
steps.content: Tap the group’s image. It’s at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Add Member.
steps.content: Tap Add Member . It’s right above the list of current members. Your contacts list will appear.

steps.title: Tap Invite to group via link.
steps.content: Tap Invite to group via link . It’s the blue link near the top of the screen. A screen containing the invitation link will appear.

steps.title: Tap Copy Link.
steps.content: Tap Copy Link . It’s the first option beneath the URL. The link is now copied to your clipboard. You can share the link in any messaging app by long-tapping the typing area and selecting Paste . If you want to send the link to someone directly, tap Share Link , then select the app with which you’d like to share it.

steps.title: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open Telegram on your iPhone or iPad. It’s the blue icon with a white paper airplane inside. You’ll usually find it on the home screen.

steps.title: Tap Chats.
steps.content: Tap Chats . It’s at the bottom-center part of the screen.

steps.title: Tap a public channel.
steps.content: Tap a public channel. The conversation will appear.

steps.title: Tap the channel’s profile image.
steps.content: Tap the channel’s profile image. It’s at the top-right corner of the screen. The “Channel Info” screen will appear.

steps.title: Tap and hold the URL under “share link.”
steps.content: Tap and hold the URL under “share link.”

steps.title: Tap Copy.
steps.content: Tap Copy . The link is now copied to your phone or tablet’s clipboard. You can share the link in any messaging app by long-tapping the typing area and selecting Paste .
